channel.title: Whats a Good Compiler For a 508 server? Help plz!
channel.description:
KK so guys as you may or may not know i have this 508 source and my compiler dont work i get this when i compile it :
The System cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue....
and inside the compiler i have this:
@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause
And when i change it to this (the location of my java) i get this:
Unrecognized Option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine. Press any key to continue...
And inside compiler is :
@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Progra~1\Java\jre1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause
If you guys can help i'd apprecite it!! ;D

item.title: Whats a Good Compiler For a 508 server? Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @G_scape G scape
item.description:
@G_scape wrote:

DUDE OMG IT WORKED THX A BUNCH[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2009, 08:05:05 pm[/size][hr]On second thoughts… this is what i get when i compile it…

.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminzone”) && playerRights > 1) {
^
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:3: class, interface, or enum expected
teleportToY = 5532;
^
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:4: class, interface, or enum expected
}/*
^
.\Bulby.\io\PacketManager.java:41: cannot access Bulby.io.packets.Commands
bad class file: .\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java
file does not contain class Bulby.io.packets.Commands
Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa
th.
public Commands command = new Commands();
^
Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2009, 08:15:49 pm[/size][hr]Anyone know how to get is to work??

Read full topic
item.source: Whats a Good Compiler For a 508 server? Help plz!

item.title: Whats a Good Compiler For a 508 server? Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

download JDK update 12 and it will be

@echo off
cd ..
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java
pause

Read full topic

K ill try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2009, 07:53:16 pm[/size][hr]Wait… what do you mean… edit what i have here to show me what i should have :

@echo off
Title Berky-Scape Compiler
cd …
“C:\Progra~1\Java\JRE1.6.0\bin\java.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause
